mapper.select: select r.review_idx as reviewIdx, r.deal_idx as dealIdx, r.user_idx as userIdx, s.username as userName, r.recommend_score as recommendScore, r.surround_score as surroundScore, r.traffic_score as trafficScore, r.living_score as livingScore, comment, r.regist_date as registDate from review r join ssafy_member s on r.user_idx = s.user_idx where deal_idx = #{aptCode}
mapper.insert: insert into review (deal_idx, user_idx, recommend_score, surround_score, traffic_score, living_score, comment, regist_date) values (dealIdx, userIdx, recommentScore, surroundScore, trafficScore, livingScore, comment, registDate)
